channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
Ok help meh. here's my story: im making a shop with zeke as the shop person. i edit the stuff for autospawn.cfg, shops.cfg, and client.java and i compile. i go up to zeke and i trade him and the store is totaly empty. heres what i put for... [b]autospawn: spawn = 541 3363 3220 0 0 0 0 0 2 //A Pk shop Client: } else if (NPCID == 541) { //Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 24; //Pk shop Shops: Shop = 24 Pk Shop 2 2 841 100 843 100 849 100 853 100 857 100 861 100 882 10000 884 10000 886 10000 888 10000 890 10000 892 10000 1135 20 1099 20 2499 20 2493 20 2503 20 2497 20[/b]
PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!!!! WHAT DID I DO WRONG~!#@!$@# help me and if it works you get mod on my new server. thnx!!

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

You only put this into shops.cfg

 Shop = 24          Pk Shop                                      2        2         841     100        843     100        849     100        853     100        857     100        861     100        882     10000    884     10000     886     10000    888     10000     890     10000    892     10000     1135   20          1099   20          2499   20          2493   20          2503   20          2497   20

And this into autospawn.cfg

spawn = 541 3060 48430 3064 4847 3018 4839 1

item.description:
@Moonbounddowntoearth wrote:

Ok help meh. here’s my story: im making a shop with zeke as the shop person. i edit the stuff for autospawn.cfg, shops.cfg, and client.java and i compile. i go up to zeke and i trade him and the store is totaly empty. heres what i put for…
autospawn: spawn = 541 3363 3220 0 0 0 0 0 2 //A Pk shop
Client: } else if (NPCID == 541) { //Zeke
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 24; //Pk shop
Shops: Shop = 24 Pk Shop 2 2 841 100 843 100 849 100 853 100 857 100 861 100 882 10000 884 10000 886 10000 888 10000 890 10000 892 10000 1135 20 1099 20 2499 20 2493 20 2503 20 2497 20

PLEASE HELP!!! WHAT DID I DO WRONG~!#@!$@# help me and if it works you get mod on my new server. thnx!!
